source.name: BBG 2008 Freedom of Information Act Report
source.description: The Broadcasting Board of Governors' annual Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) report includes detailed statistics on the number and disposition of FOIA requests, including response times, volume of requests, and personnel costs.   This information is being presented for the first time in a machine-readable format that allows members of the public, including public interest organizations, scholars and the media, to track the Agency's performance.  This set covers fiscal year 2008.
